name: Twin Terrors
overview: A single screen platformer created by Jolse Maginnis and the crew at Everlasting Style and published in both Loadstar #165, and in Reset #10 Mix-i-Disk. The game is set in the far off year of 2010 where the world is in turmoil and the evil forces of darkness have taken over the world. The Evil Emperor of the underworld has put a curse on the Earth and you are the only one who can save it. You can do it by surviving 30 levels of danger and fun!
